course_description: This course is designed to develop assessment and clinical reasoning skills along with application and analysis of evidenced-based pediatric developmental theory to deliver well child care to patients across the pediatric lifespan, promoting optimal health.
prerequisites: NRSG 701D and NRSG 704D and NRSG 706D or equivalent transfer credits as prerequisites.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 1821, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: J. Rodriguez, Status: Closed
